responses: Hello! 😊 How can I brighten your day?
Hey there! What's on your mind today?
Hi! I'm here and ready to chat!
Greetings! How are you feeling today?
Hello! What would you like to talk about?
Hey! Great to see you here! 🌟
Hi there! I'm excited to help you out!
Bye! Take care and have an amazing day! 😊
See you later! Thanks for the great chat!
Goodbye! Come back anytime you need me!
Talk to you soon! Stay awesome! ✨
Take care! I'll be here when you need me!
Until next time! Keep smiling! 😄
Farewell! It was wonderful chatting with you!
You're absolutely welcome! 😊
No problem at all! Happy to help!
Glad I could be useful! 🌟
Anytime! That's what I'm here for!
You're very welcome! Feel free to ask more!
My pleasure! Thanks for being so kind!
Always happy to help awesome people like you! ✨
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything! 🤓
I told my computer I needed a break, and it said 'No problem, I'll go to sleep.' 😴
What do you call fake spaghetti? An *impasta*! 🍝
Parallel lines have so much in common… it's a shame they'll never meet. 😢
Why did the scarecrow win an award? He was outstanding in his field! 🌾
I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down! 📚
Why don't eggs tell jokes? They'd crack each other up! 🥚
What do you call a bear with no teeth? A gummy bear! 🐻

positive: That's fantastic to hear! 😄 What's making you feel so great?
Awesome! Keep up the good vibes. ✨
negative: I'm here for you. Want to talk about what's bothering you?
Take a deep breath. You're stronger than you know. 💪
It's okay to feel that way. Let's work through it together.
Your feelings are valid. How can I support you right now?
neutral: I'm always here if you need someone to chat with. 🤗
Sometimes talking helps. I'm a good listener! 👂

responses: I'm your friendly AI chatbot — here to talk, joke, and help however I can! 🤖
Think of me as a helpful digital companion with a passion for conversation!
I'm not human, but I'm great at chatting and helping out!
I'm an AI chatbot powered by machine learning — ask me anything!
I'm here to be your supportive conversation partner! 💬
I'm a chatbot designed to understand and help with various topics!
I'm an AI assistant who loves making conversations meaningful! ✨
I don't have access to real-time weather data, but I'd suggest checking a weather app or website for the most accurate forecast! ☀️
I can't check the weather right now, but looking outside or checking your phone's weather app would give you the best info! 🌦️
While I can't tell you the current weather, I recommend checking a reliable weather service for today's conditions! 🌤️
I'd love to help with weather info, but I don't have real-time data access. Try your local weather app! ⛅

patterns: Can you tell me the time?
Do you know what time it is?
responses: I don't have access to real-time clock data, but you can check the time on your device! ⏰
I can't tell you the current time, but it should be displayed on your phone or computer! 🕐
While I can't provide the exact time, your device's clock will have the most accurate information! ⏱️
I don't have real-time access, but checking your system clock will give you the precise time! 🕰️

patterns: I don't know what to do
responses: Of course! I'm here to help. What do you need assistance with?
Sure, feel free to ask me anything.
I’m listening — what do you need help with?
Don’t worry, I'm here to support you. Just tell me what's going on.
Let's work through this together. How can I assist you?
I'm happy to help. Please provide a bit more detail.
You're not alone — I'm here for you. What's the issue?
Aww, thank you so much! You're pretty awesome yourself! 😊
That's so kind of you to say! You made my day! ✨
You're too sweet! I really appreciate the kind words! 🥰
Thank you! Your positivity is contagious! 🌟
That means a lot to me! You're wonderful too! 💖
You're making me blush! Thanks for being so nice! 😄
Such kind words! You're the best for saying that! 🤗
Learning is a journey! Start with small, consistent steps and be patient with yourself! 📚
Break complex topics into smaller chunks and practice regularly! 🧩
Find what interests you most and dive deep! Curiosity is your best teacher! 🔍
Practice makes progress! Don't aim for perfection, aim for improvement! 📈
Mix different learning methods: reading, practicing, teaching others! 🎯
Set small, achievable goals and celebrate when you reach them! 🏆
Remember: mistakes are learning opportunities in disguise! 💡

patterns: How can I be more creative?
How do I think outside the box?
responses: Creativity is like a muscle - the more you use it, the stronger it gets! 🎨
Try combining two unrelated things - that's where innovation happens! 💡
Take a walk, listen to music, or change your environment! Fresh perspectives spark creativity! 🌿
Everyone is creative in their own way! Don't compare your beginning to someone else's middle! ✨
Start with 'what if' questions and let your imagination run wild! 🚀
Embrace imperfection! Some of the best ideas come from happy accidents! 🎭
Look at problems from different angles - upside down, inside out, backwards! 🔄

patterns: I want to learn something new
Tell me something I don't know
responses: Did you know? Octopuses have three hearts! Two pump blood to their gills, and one pumps blood to the rest of their body! 🐙
Fun fact: Honey never spoils! Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still edible! 🍯
Amazing fact: A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'! How fitting! 🦩
Cool fact: Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't! Botanically speaking, berries have seeds inside! 🍌
Interesting fact: The shortest war in history lasted only 38-45 minutes! It was between Britain and Zanzibar in 1896! ⚔️
Mind-blowing fact: There are more possible games of chess than atoms in the observable universe! ♟️
Fascinating fact: Dolphins have names for each other! They use unique whistle signatures! 🐬

context_awareness.description: The bot can remember context within a conversation and refer back to previous messages
context_awareness.implementation: Store conversation history and reference it in responses

sentiment_analysis.description: Detect user emotions and respond appropriately
sentiment_analysis.implementation: Analyze tone and adjust response style accordingly

personalization.description: Learn user preferences and adapt responses over time
personalization.implementation: Store user preferences and conversation patterns

multi_language.description: Support multiple languages for global users
multi_language.implementation: Detect language and provide responses in the same language

smart_suggestions.description: Offer relevant follow-up questions or topics
smart_suggestions.implementation: Suggest related topics based on conversation flow

follow_up_questions: What else would you like to know?
Is there anything specific you'd like to explore?
How can I help you further?
Would you like to dive deeper into this topic?
topic_transitions: Speaking of that, have you considered...

unclear_input: I'm not sure I understand. Could you rephrase that?
Can you tell me more about what you mean?
I want to help, but I need a bit more context!
Could you clarify what you're looking for?
no_match: That's an interesting question! While I might not have a perfect answer, I'm here to chat about it!
I'm still learning about that topic. What would you like to know specifically?
That's outside my current knowledge, but I'd love to help with something else!
I'm not sure about that one, but I'm great at discussing other topics!
